title: Homepage
cleaned_text: Get the lessons for your classroom [ Elementary ](/lessons/elementary) This content focuses on different kinds of germs, the scientific method, and people important to progress in the human fight against infectious diseases. [ Middle ](/lessons/middle) This content focuses on the inescapable relationships between humans and germs and how scientific understanding progresses over time and with new discoveries. [ High School ](/lessons/high-school) This content focuses on the human immune system, disease, vaccination, biomedical research, and understanding and assessing the quality of scientific information.
